Cheat.Text: MASTER CODE for god mode and honor always max
Infinite items and consumables(disable during unique mission items like bounty posters...)
MAX Honor updated(set honor to max one time, do an honor related task to see the difference)
add 30 pelts(enable after skinning pelt disable after putting on horse!)
fast shooting (no bullet loading , skips the animation of loading bullets)
freeze all(ammo,throwables,money,items,trapper and pearson stock)disable during unique mission items like bounty posters...
